t: What is DIRECTV NOW? | DIRECTV Support

t: DirecTV unifies product line-up under single brand identity
s: April 14, 2025 - MyFree DirecTV, which offers a line-up of around 100 free, ad-supported streaming TV channels available through the DirecTV apps for phones, tablets, Roku, Samsung smart TVs, Fire TV, Android TV (Google TV) and Apple TV.

t: Fire TV beefs up live TV offering with DirecTV integration
s: April 19, 2023 - Amazon’s Fire TV is stepping up its live TV game, launching this week a new integration with DirecTV. | The integration is only available for U.S Fire TV customers with a DirecTV Stream subscription.

t: Pairing Direct tv remote with Amazon Fire tv. | DIRECTV Community Forums
s: June 28, 2022 - Well, DIRECTV shouldn’t have it. Amazon Fire TV is NOT the name of the TV, it’s just the OS that the TV runs. You have to look for the actual brand/model of the TV and choose that as the brand in Remote Setup of the DIRECTV receiver.
